title: Journal
description: Schema for Journal entity type-specific fields

date.description: Date of the journal entry (in-world or real-world)

session_number.description: Session number for campaign session logs

author_id.description: Reference to Character entity (author in-world) or user

journal_type.description: Type of journal (e.g., Session Log, Diary, Report)

calendar_id.description: Reference to Calendar entity for in-world dating

location_id.description: Reference to Location entity where events occurred
